Class Execution.ExceptionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.lifecycle.Execution.ExceptionContext
  • Enclosing class:
    Execution

    public static class Execution.ExceptionContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The ExceptionContext contains information about where an exception was encountered in an XChain.
